title: State aid for the needy
brief_description: Social aid to the people of Fribourg is adminstered under the Federal Social Aid Law. This provides financial assistance to those whose income is below the specified basic income. Assists in vocational education of normal and physically handicapped children, provides accommodation and entertainment for the aged, nurseries for the children of working mothers, as well as financial and domestic aid to young mothers.
